meanings.definition: The forked bone between the neck and breast of a bird.
meanings.sent1: The wishbones of the bird help support its body structure.
meanings.sent2: I found a wishbone while walking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The wishbones of the chicken seemed to be waving at me.
meanings.sent4: The wishbones of the bird held the promise of flight.
meanings.sent5: The wishbones were delicate yet strong, like nature's own design.

meanings.definition: A wishbone-shaped object used in a tradition of making a wish and breaking it.
meanings.sent1: We each held one end of the wishbones, ready to make a wish.
meanings.sent2: The wishbones snapped with a satisfying crack as we pulled them apart.
meanings.sent3: The wishbones made a tinkling sound as they collided in mid-air.
meanings.sent4: The wishbones broke apart, releasing our wishes into the air.
meanings.sent5: The wishbones symbolized hope and dreams, waiting to be fulfilled.
